ygData.subject: Re: Force Shock & Stun
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Clash is a wonderfull spell for soloing for exemple when you want to fetch a monster and bring him to a safe place for killing it . for spellcaster mob it
ygData.messageBody:
> SPOILER-SPOILER-SPOILER
> There is a lvl 20 spell that we get that does stun your opponent though. It
> is Tishan's Clash. It will stun your opponent for about 2 seconds (much like
> a skel might stun you), and does approx. 30dmg. The recover time for it is
> about the same as force shock, so you cannot cast it several times in
> succession if you were hoping to keep the opponent stunned. The mana cost on
> it is very high though, so I don't really see a valid use for it (if the
> stun time were longer, it would be a nice spell, but 2 seconds just isn't
> long enough).

Clash is a wonderfull spell
for soloing for exemple when you want to fetch a monster and bring him
to
a safe place for killing it .
for spellcaster mob it is a MUST some mob can cast a greater heal
that mean that they can nearly completly heal themself
and you dont want that to happen so you just stun them

--
Hanidus level 33 wizard on KARANA
